title: Hypnotic Liberation / Non-Verbal Hypnosis / Dr Paret
description:
Dr. Paret's students use the techniques learned at our school to liberate the subject from negative feelings. You will see a mesmeric crisis and somnambulism. These techniques are non-verbal and deeply transformative.

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Check out some other videos on our channel:

https://youtu.be/v6iN-wIV-14
